metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12207 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - high
metadata.Description:
Improper invalidation for page table updates by a virtual guest operatingsystem for multiple Intel(R) Processors may allow an authenticated user topotentially enable denial of service of the host system via local access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-12207` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-214-generic - 4.15.0-69.78
linux-image-4.15.0-214-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-69.78
linux-image-4.15.0-214-lowlatency - 4.15.0-69.78
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-214-generic - 4.15.0-69.78
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-214-lowlatency - 4.15.0-69.78
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-5.0.0-35-generic - 5.0.0-35.38~18.04.1
